label: years
description: The time span that is modeled

label: discount rate
description: Discount rate %

label: Rubber establishment cost
description: Cost of rubber establishment in Nepalese rupee/ha  (1000 euro equals ~144000 NPR)

label: intercropping establishment cost
description: Cost of rubber and pepper establishment in Nepalese rupee/ha

label: rubber maintenance cost
description: Cost to maintain rubber system (NPR)

label: variance rubber maintenance cost
description: The variance in rubber maintenance cost (%)

label: pepper maintenance cost
description: Annual cost to maintain black pepper system (NPR)

label: variance pepper maintenance cost
description: The variance in pepper maintenance cost (%)

label: pepper yield
description: The peak yield of pepper (t/ha)

label: variance pepper yield
description: The variance in pepper yield (%)

label: Rubber yield
description: The peak yield of rubber (t/ha)

label: variance rubber yield
description: The variance in rubber yield (%)

label: rubber price
description: Price of rubber per tonnes

label: pepper price
description: Price of pepper per tonne

label: fertilizer monoculture
description: Nutrients recycled equivalent of NPK fertilizer bags of 5O kg (15:15:15) from litter fall in rubber monoculture (kg/ha)

label: variance fertilizer monoculture
description: The variance in number of NPK fertilizer bags in monoculture (%)

label: fertilizer intercropping
description: Nutrients recycled equivalent of NPK fertilizer bags of 5O kg (15:15:15) from litter fall in Rubber-black pepper AF (kg/ha)

label: variance fertilizer intercropping
description: The variance in number of NPK fertilizer bags in AF (%)

label: fertilizer price
description: Monetary value of a 50 kg NPK fertilizer bag (NPR)

label: water price
description: Monetary value of water saved through interception in rubber mono (NPR)

label: variance water
description: Variance in water costs(%)

label: water competition probability
description: The probability that roots will compete (higher irrigation costs and lower yields (%)

label: probabilty yield if competition
description: Estimated yield loss in case of competition to water compared to well watered plants (%)

label: variance yield if competition
description: variation in yield if competition (%)

label: variance water monoculture
description: the variance in water saved in interception in rubber mono (m^3/ha)

label: mean water
description: Mean of water(m^3/ha)

label: water competition in intercropping
description: plus 600 compared to "usual" need (m^3/ha)

label: knowledge gap
description: Percentual estimation of knowledge gaps to manage and yield the pepper (%)

label: variance knoweldge gap
description: Variation in knowledge gap (%)
